gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 121, Heat 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Heat, 121-104. Kawhi Leonard recorded 24 points, six rebounds, five assists, and four steals for the Clippers, while Paul George added 23 points and three 3PM in the victory. Bam Adebayo tallied 21 points, 15 rebounds, and four assists for the Heat in the losing effort. The Clippers are on a three - game winning streak as they improve to 20-12 on the season, while the Heat fall to 19-14.
